name: table_schema_specs_for_c2m2_encoding_of_dcc_metadata
title: A complete list of schematic specifications for the resources (tables) that will be used to represent DCC (meta)data prior to ingest into a CFDE C2M2 database instance.

resources.name: file
resources.title: file
resources.description: A digital asset

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this file

fields.name: location
fields.description: A resolvable identifier pointing to the location of this file

fields.name: information_type
fields.description: A CV term ID referencing the type of data contained in this file (target ontology: EDAM)

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: A CV term ID referencing the data format in which this file is encoded (target ontology: EDAM)

fields.name: length
fields.description: The length of this file in bytes

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A suggested local filename for this file

fields.name: md5
fields.description: MD5 checksum for this file

resources.name: bio_sample
resources.title: bio_sample
resources.description: A tissue sample or other physical specimen

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this bio_sample

fields.name: sample_type
fields.description: A CV term ID referencing the type of material represented by this bio_sample (target ontology: OBI)

fields.name: anatomy
fields.description: A CV term ID locating the origin of this bio_sample within the physiology of its subject (target ontology: UBERON)

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: A foreign key referencing the experimental protocol that generated this bio_sample

resources.name: subject
resources.title: subject
resources.description: The source organism(s) from which a bio_sample has been generated

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject

fields.name: granularity
fields.description: A foreign key referencing the scope of this subject: single organism; group of named organisms (e.g. host plus pathogen); environmental sample

resources.name: data_event
resources.title: data event
resources.description: An event which generates a data object, e.g.: an assay producing a bio_sample; a procedure that produces one or more files from a bio_sample (e.g., sequencing); an observation producing a phenotypic datum (e.g. a BMI measurement); a procedure generating new data by processing existing files (e.g., sequence assembly)

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this data_event

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: A foreign key referencing the experimental protocol (or protocol portion) associated with this data_event

fields.name: rank
fields.description: An integer specifying the relative sequence ordering associated with this data_event within the set of associated data_events

fields.name: event_ts
fields.description: A datestamp explicitly specifying the date on which this bio_sample was collected/generated

resources.name: dataset
resources.title: dataset
resources.description: A named collection of objects

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this dataset

fields.name: data_source
fields.description: A foreign key referencing the data-generating research study or entity that produced this dataset

fields.name: title
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this dataset

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this dataset

resources.name: subject_granularity
resources.title: subject granularity
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: A descriptor for the scope of a subject (the source for a bio_sample), e.g.: single organism; group of named organisms (e.g. host plus pathogen); environmental sample

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_granularity

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_granularity

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_granularity

resources.name: sample_type
resources.title: sample type
resources.description: CV: Dictionary of terms describing types of material that can be bio_samples

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this sample_type

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this sample_type

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this sample_type

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate names) for this sample_type

resources.name: information_type
resources.title: information type
resources.description: CV: Dictionary of terms describing types of data contained in file objects

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this information_type

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this information_type

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this information_type

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate names) for this information_type

resources.name: file_format
resources.title: file format
resources.description: CV: Dictionary of terms describing formats in which file objects can be encoded

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this file_format

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this file_format

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this file_format

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate names) for this file_format

resources.name: anatomy
resources.title: anatomy
resources.description: CV: Dictionary of terms locating the origin of a bio_sample within the physiology of its subject

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this anatomy object

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this anatomy object

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this anatomy object

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate names) for this anatomy object

resources.name: protocol
resources.title: protocol
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: A sequence-based description of an experimental method

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this protocol

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this protocol

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this protocol

resources.name: common_fund_program
resources.title: common fund program
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: A list of data-generating research programs or entities; every dataset object must be bound to a member of this collection

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this common_fund_program

fields.name: website
fields.description: A URL for the main website of this common_fund_program

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this common_fund_program

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this common_fund_program

resources.name: subject_group
resources.title: subject group
resources.description: A named collection of subjects

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_group

fields.name: title
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_group

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_group

resources.name: bio_samples_in_datasets
resources.title: bio_samples in datasets
resources.description: Association between a bio_sample and a dataset containing it

fields.name: bio_sample_id
fields.description: The ID of a contained bio_sample

fields.name: containing_dataset_id
fields.description: The ID of a dataset containing the contained bio_sample

resources.name: datasets_in_datasets
resources.title: datasets in datasets
resources.description: Association between a dataset and a dataset containing it

fields.name: dataset_id
fields.description: The ID of a contained dataset

fields.name: containing_dataset_id
fields.description: The ID of a dataset containing the contained dataset

resources.name: files_in_datasets
resources.title: files in datasets
resources.description: Association between a file and a dataset containing it

fields.name: file_id
fields.description: The ID of a contained file

fields.name: containing_dataset_id
fields.description: The ID of a dataset containing the contained file

resources.name: subjects_in_datasets
resources.title: subjects in datasets
resources.description: Association between a subject and a dataset containing it

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: The ID of a contained subject

fields.name: containing_dataset_id
fields.description: The ID of a dataset containing the contained subject

resources.name: bio_sample_produced_by
resources.title: bio_sample produced by data_event
resources.description: Association between a bio_sample and the (unique) data_event that produced it

fields.name: bio_sample_id
fields.description: The ID of a bio_sample

fields.name: data_event_id
fields.description: The ID of the (unique) data_event that produced the bio_sample identified in the first column

reference.title: ID of data_event that produced this bio_sample

resources.name: file_produced_by
resources.title: file produced by data_event
resources.description: Association between a file and the (unique) data_event that produced it

fields.name: file_id
fields.description: The ID of a file

fields.name: data_event_id
fields.description: The ID of the (unique) data_event that produced the file identified in the first column

reference.title: ID of data_event that produced this file

resources.name: bio_sample_processed_by
resources.title: bio_sample processed by data_event
resources.description: Association between a bio_sample and a (not necessarily unique) data_event that processes it as an input

fields.name: bio_sample_id
fields.description: The ID of a bio_sample

fields.name: data_event_id
fields.description: The ID of a data_event that processed the bio_sample identified in the first column

reference.title: ID of data_event that processed this bio_sample

resources.name: dataset_processed_by
resources.title: dataset processed by data_event
resources.description: Association between a dataset and a (not necessarily unique) data_event that processes it as an input

fields.name: dataset_id
fields.description: The ID of a dataset

fields.name: data_event_id
fields.description: The ID of a data_event that processed the dataset identified in the first column

reference.title: ID of data_event that processed this dataset

resources.name: file_processed_by
resources.title: file processed by data_event
resources.description: Association between a file and a (not necessarily unique) data_event that processes it as an input

fields.name: file_id
fields.description: The ID of a file

fields.name: data_event_id
fields.description: The ID of a data_event that processed the file identified in the first column

reference.title: ID of data_event that processed this file

resources.name: subject_processed_by
resources.title: subject processed by data_event
resources.description: Association between a subject and a (not necessarily unique) data_event that processes it as an input

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: The ID of a subject

fields.name: data_event_id
fields.description: The ID of a data_event that processed the subject identified in the first column

reference.title: ID of data_event that processed this subject

resources.name: subjects_in_subject_groups
resources.title: subjects in subject groups
resources.description: Association between a subject and a containing subject_group

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: The ID of a subject

fields.name: subject_group_id
fields.description: The ID of a subject_group that contains the subject identified in the first column

resources.name: subject_taxonomy
resources.title: subject taxonomy
resources.description: Association between a subject and a (numeric) NCBI Taxonomy Database ID describing the subject

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: The ID of a subject

fields.name: ncbi_taxon_id
fields.description: A CV term ID describing the taxonomy of the subject identified in the first column (target ontology: NCBI Taxonomy Database)

resources.name: ncbi_taxonomy_db
resources.title: NCBI Taxonomy DB
resources.description: CV: Dictionary of terms describing taxa indexed in the NCBI Taxonomy database

fields.name: id
fields.description: The canonical ID of this taxon

fields.name: name
fields.description: Short name for this taxon

fields.name: description
fields.description: Long descriptor for this taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate names) for this taxon

resources.name: auxiliary_data
resources.title: auxiliary data
resources.description: DCC-specific (extension) metadata not covered by the core C2M2 model

fields.name: object_type
fields.description: A keyword representing the (C2M2 table-name) type of object with which the metadata contained in the current record is associated

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the object associated with the metadata in the current record

fields.name: keyword
fields.description: A short, human-readable description of the metadata in the current record

fields.name: index
fields.description: An integer index (should default to 0 for atomic objects) meant to facilitate the optional serialization of arrays

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the metadata represented by the current record
